title: Everyone's thoughts on rotating game modes?
body:
I think it's about damn time honestly!!

Although if they plan to have a new (i mean as in different from the last, not like totally new every time lmao) game mode every week idk why, say, URF would only come around twice..

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue
